meanings.definition: Not understanding or grasping the meaning of something.
meanings.sent1: The uncomprehending child stared blankly at the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed the uncomprehending look on the student's face during the complex lesson.
meanings.sent3: The uncomprehending puppy tilted its head in confusion at the disappearing treat.
meanings.sent4: Her uncomprehending gaze lingered on the foreign text, unable to decipher its message.
meanings.sent5: The uncomprehending expression on his face revealed his confusion to everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of comprehension or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The uncomprehending expression on her face indicated she was lost in the conversation.
meanings.sent2: His uncomprehending response to the joke made it clear he didn't get it.
meanings.sent3: The uncomprehending cat pawed at the invisible laser pointer, unaware of the trick.
meanings.sent4: The uncomprehending audience stared at the abstract art, unable to interpret its message.
meanings.sent5: Their uncomprehending silence in the meeting revealed their confusion about the new policy.
